review.reviewBody: taste great but way larger portions when eating in house

60. Sweet-&-Sour Chicken  was tasteless, soggy, and generally dissapointing. The 21. Deep-Fried Pork Dumplings weren't bad but did seem like I was chewing on fried fat at times. 1. Shrimp Dumplings (Har Gow) were pretty good but could've used a dipping sauce that was included, I just used soy sauce
